ygData.subject: Re: re:patch probs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... difference...I love it! Even my 450 mhz runs much smoother these days. HIKS.. I just got a peek of those new chars models using FX 5600 WOW they all look
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Fire on High" <scendera@o...>
wrote:
> I just got a cheap Geforce FX 5200.....holy cow what a
difference...I love it! Even my 450 mhz runs much smoother these
days.

HIKS.. I just got a peek of those new chars models using FX 5600 WOW
they all look taller!!!

--- EQ Tech <eqtech@...> wrote:
> Hello Kent,
>
> Thank you for contacting the Sony Online
> Entertainment Customer Service
> department.
>
> Unfortunately, the only way to receive the downloads
> is to use the
> Patcher.
>
> You might also want to copy the EQ directory from an
> updated computer
> that has EQ. You would still need to perform a full
> scan, but it would
> greatly reduce the download time.

They LIES!!! Following instruction JUST AS THEY SAY.. I downloaded,
burned to cds and then copied over the folder.. when I run the
everquest.exe it check for files in folder and found disrepancy in
everquest.exe and testeverquest.exe GRR seems like the executable
files for dial-up and cable connection are different or somehow its
logged to a specific IP add.

Browsing through the everquest.log file and then getting help from
some friends at forum.. I just run the eqgame.exe with patchme
behind it, to "trick" the game into NOT patching.. WOW I manage to
log in.. even chat with GM in the chat board inside, grr no help
coming from the grumpy GM too.. I tried clicking PLAY button,
connected in SUPER FAST speed.. u know, that Firiona Vie loading
screen, that has loading froglock under it (saw some funny msg
there, about fippy and anyone ever read this msg jokes).. took about
2-4seconds to load the world, and the NEW chars models looks great,
somehow ALL my chars look different, erudite looks so tall and bald,
my high elf female cleric looks strange, like a bronze amazon, when
I recalled she looks like Firiona Vie 3 years ago.. sigh.

Clicking on any of the characters.. of course crash me back, giving
bit failed error something msg. Now, I am trying to download the
everquest.exe and testeverquest.exe and whatever various files they
r throwing at me, since I had manage to download 2.7gig already at
the cable company. Good luck to me.. camping mobs didnt cost me so
much time and money, GRR!
